subsection.name: Bootstrapping
subsection.p: The bootstrap procedure will build the prerequisite products needed to execute the Depot build tool. To initiate the bootstrap build you must have Ant @ANT-JAR-VERSION@ installed together with an SVN client.
Create a directory to hold the svn codebase (e.g. c:\dev\dpml\main), checkout the sources, cd to the main directory and invoke the bootstrap build procedure.
subsection.pre: $ cd dev\dpml\main $ svn checkout svn://svn.berlios.de/dpml/trunk/main $ bootstrap
